WorkItem.Description:
Hi, i am trying to read cell background color with PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 class
I have bug like this http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/workitem/7033?ProjectName=phpexcel
Attached xls file and php test.
Class C3 and C4 have exactly same color  E46D0A
But C3 was set from root of "Fill" menu and C4 was set from Fill->More colors->custom
So for C4 i getting wrong color  FF6600
WorkItem.Summary: Excel5 reader not recognizing theme background colors
